abstract: Potential suitors, including Barclays and Bank of America, are said to be seeking help from the Fed to make an acquisition palatable.
snippet: Potential suitors, including Barclays and Bank of America, are said to be seeking help from the Fed to make an acquisition palatable.
lead_paragraph: Only a day ago, the head of Lehman Brothers, the beleaguered investment bank, sought to assure Wall Street that the firm could survive on its own.

headline.main: Lehman Said to Be Looking for a Buyer as Pressure Builds
headline.print_headline: Pressure Builds As Lehman Faces Mounting Losses

byline.original: By Jenny Anderson and Andrew Ross Sorkin
